players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night. I think he's the one who killed Charlie."
Bob: "I have an alibi for the night of Charlie's death. I was at the outskirts of the village, gathering herbs for my medicinal potions. Diana, you can ask anyone in the village about it."
